DataElement.preferredName: Person HLA Typing Second Allele Antigen Value Collected Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown/not applicable indicator related to a person in which blood or tissue samples are collected to determine their second series of a given gene per human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person HLA Typing Second Allele Antigen Value Collected
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person in which blood or tissue samples are collected to determine their second series of a given gene per human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.

Property.preferredName: HLA Typing Second Allele Antigen Value Collected
Property.preferredDefinition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.:Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.:one of a series of possible alternative forms of a given gene, differing in DNA sequence, and affecting the functioning of a single product.:Any substance that appears foreign or potentially adverse to the body and elicits immune response.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.:Collected; brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: A process in which blood or tissue samples are analyzed to determine their human leukocyte antigen (HLA) profiles.
Coming next after the first in position in space or time or degree or magnitude.

Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in nucleotide sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.

Any substance, generally a protein, that stimulates the immune system and elicits an immune response.  Recognition by the immune system elicits either a T-lymphocyte response, recognizing processed antigens, or a B-lymphocyte response, producing antibodies that bind to unprocessed antigens.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
Collected; brought together in one place.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.
